thread.title: Savannah Guthrie Refers to Husband Mike as Matt (as in Lauer), Hilarity Ensues
thread.title_full: Savannah Guthrie Refers to Husband Mike as Matt (as in Lauer), Hilarity Ensues

title: Savannah Guthrie Refers to Husband Mike as Matt (as in Lauer), Hilarity Ensues
text:
Just Like Us: Celebrity Moms 
Guthrie, 45 — who made her return to the morning program on Monday, February 27, following a maternity leave for her 2-month-old son, Charles — was telling a story about breastfeeding her newborn while discussing the effects of having children on women’s sleep compared to men’s sleep. Seconds in, she said Lauer’s first name when she really meant to mention her PR consultant hubby, 48. Not surprisingly, the gaffe made cohosts Al Roker and Sheinelle Jones crack up. Savannah Guthrie, Al Roker and Sheinelle Jones 
"Breaking news! Anything you want to talk about?" Jones teased, to which Guthrie responded, “Where is my Freud textbook? That’s not the first time that’s happened.” Celebrity Babies 2016 
The camera then cut to Lauer, 59, who was reporting live from Washington, D.C. “That’s our secret,” he joked as a blushing Guthrie planted her palm against her forehead. "This is what happens when you leave," she said. "It all falls apart." Matt Lauer 
In a later segment, Guthrie — who also shares daughter Vale, 2, with Feldman — poked fun at herself by introducing Lauer as “Mike.” 
"Matt at work, Mike at home. I'm not paying for college for Vale and Charlie, all right?" Lauer quipped. Guthrie shot back in jest, “Take one look at those kids. We all know who the daddy is, OK?” Mike Feldman and Savannah Guthrie attend Showtime's 'Billions' series premiere at Museum of Modern Art on January 7, 2016 in New York City. Taylor Hill/WireImage Star Dads Bond With Their Kids: Cute Pics 
Watch the funny moment in the video above!
